thread.title: Whirlpool Ends Merger Talks With AGA Rangemaster
thread.title_full: Whirlpool Ends Merger Talks With AGA Rangemaster - WSJ

author: Maria Armental
title: Whirlpool Ends Merger Talks With AGA Rangemaster
text:
Whirlpool Corp., the world’s largest home-appliance manufacturer by sales, has dropped merger talks with British cast-iron range cooker maker AGA Rangemaster Group, according to a regulatory filing.
The announcement comes days after AGA’s shareholders backed a takeover bid of £129 million, or about $198 million, from Middleby Corp., a maker of commercial and residential cooking equipment based in Elgin, Ill. A court hearing to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
